remarks: The intersection of transitive relations is a transitive relation. (Contributed by Richard Penner, 24-Dec-2019.)
statement:
trrelind.r $e |- ( ph -> ( R o. R ) C_ R ) $.
trrelind.s $e |- ( ph -> ( S o. S ) C_ S ) $.
trrelind.t $e |- ( ph -> T = ( R i^i S ) ) $.
trrelind $p |- ( ph -> ( T o. T ) C_ T ) $.
